title: still dishonarable
body:
i was banned cuz i was toxic. and now i dont even chat and winning 13 games in a row.
of course, i got lots of honors either. but still, im dishonarable so that i cant get any
loot items.. how can i get over this?

replies.body: Leveling back up in Honor again can take some time! Though there isn't an exact time frame or amount of games to play, it's important that you consistently show good behavior, both in gameplay and chat, by playing games and don't be a jerk. In time, you'll unlock the ability to progress in Honor again! :)
